name: South Bandung Trip
description:
South Bandung better known as
agro-tourism center activities (agriculture and tea plantations in Rancabali,
Ciwidey, Malabar, Pangalengan and Gununghalu), Water Tourism (Situ Patenggang
and Situ Cileunca) and Nature tourism (Kamojang Crater, white craters, hot
springs Cimanggu and Ciwalini, camping ground Ranca Upas deer/roe conservation).
